results.title: Amlodipine/atorvastatin: the first cross risk factor polypill for the prevention and treatment of cardiovascular disease.
results.text_hl: Combination therapy of @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine besylate@@@ (Norvasc, Pfizer Ltd) with @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin calcium@@@ (Lipitor, Pfizer Ltd), marketed as @<m>CHEMICAL_amlodipine_atorvastatin_drug_combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C487936 @@@Caduet@@@ (Pfizer Ltd) is the first dual-therapy compound designed to treat @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and/or @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina@@@ and @DISEASE_Dyslipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@ concurrently with a single daily pill in the full range of dosing combinations.
